DisplayName: Do you remove it from the NT version output?
Description: Parameters marked with ○ are excluded in the NT version package.
Specify SFX variation (used to identify SFX in combination with TimeActEditor ID)
Set the effect that occurs when using a tool
Conditionally replace the display with another tool ID. The tool ID on the game data side does not change
YesNo Message ID used when displaying the dialog
Allow to use only when the special effect of the set state change type is applied
Consumable items for which 0 or more is set for the pot group ID can be possessed by the number of "pots" with the same pot group ID.
Old (magic ID linked to a scroll)
Level that can be sold at the store

Minimum: etc.) whose parameters fluctuate depending on skills
Increment: set each action so that the determined effect can correspond to the effect such as "power up only weapon attack". Set "None" for items that do not need to be set

Description: Set the animation to play when using the tool

DisplayName: Do you want to open the menu
Description: Menu type that opens when using an item
Specified to control whether it can be used by the special effect applied
Condition category to add to call ID
Is it possible to use a surviving player?
Is it possible to do a black ghost?
Can it be used during multiplayer?
Will it be consumed when used (whether the number of possessions will decrease)
Will it be equipped automatically when picked up?
Is it an item that you can only have one?
Can you throw away the item? TRUE = thrown away
Can you leave it in the warehouse?

DisplayName: Can I use it with my right bare hand?
Description: Can't be used when the right-handed weapon is bare-handed?

DisplayName: Whether to delete at the time of lap
Description: Whether to delete at the time of lap
Do you want to enchant your weapon?
Is it an item to repair?

Description: Is it prohibited to use in the arena?

Description: Is it prohibited to use outside the arena?

Description: Is it possible to cancel early?
Whether to reflect special effects (such as ability value correction)

DisplayName: ID that synchronizes the number increase / decrease
Description: When the number of items is changed
Minimum: the items with the same ID will be changed at the same time. 0: Not synchronized

Description: Weapon ID to refer to when using the tool

DisplayName: Item lottery ID_for map at the time of vagrant
Description: -1: No vagrant 0: No lottery 1 ~: With lottery

DisplayName: Vagrant Bonus Enemy Drop Item Lottery ID_Map
Description: -1: No drop 0: No lottery 1 ~: With lottery

DisplayName: Vagrant item Enemy drop item Lottery ID_for map
Description: -1: No drop 0: No lottery 1 ~: With lottery
SFXID until the effect is activated when you try to use the item
SFX ID when the item is activated

DisplayName: Can be used while the Great Rune is active
Description: Can it be used with a large rune activated?

DisplayName: Is it a bonfire warp item?
Description: If the state change type "Warp Prohibition" is applied when TRUE
Minimum: remove the function to disable the item.

DisplayName: Can it be used in a ladder?
Description: Check here for items available in the ladder
Whether items can be used between session probability and initial synchronization

DisplayName: Is it subject to warp prohibition?
Minimum: disable the item if the state change type "Warp Prohibition" is applied.

DisplayName: Only available when there is a disconnect penalty
Description: A flag that allows you to determine if an item is only available when a client disconnect penalty is incurred.
Replenishment item / Replenishment type when replenishing a replenished item.
Controls whether or not to automatically replenish and default settings

DisplayName: Can you put it on the spot
Description: Can I put the item on the spot? TRUE = can be placed
Whether to display in the item acquisition log when acquiring the item (not entered: ○)

DisplayName: Is it a horse call item?
Description: Is it an item that summons a horse? Cannot be used if the horse died or the PC is in a horse-prohibited area
Whether to display it in the item acquisition dialog when acquiring an item (not entered: new only)

DisplayName: Is it a Nemuri collection item?
Description: Is it a Nemuri collection item?

Description: Can it be used while riding?

Description: Is it prohibited to use while not riding?
Sort item type ID. In the sort "Item type order"
Minimum: the same ID is displayed together as the same group.

Rarity used in item acquisition logs
Whether there are item usage restrictions for buddy items
